title: Automated Resume Job Matching Engine with Bright Data MCP & OpenAI 4o mini
author: Ranjan Dailata
readme:
![Automated Resume Job Matching Engine.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Automated_Resume_Job_Matching_Engine_ac892db331.png)

### Notice

Community nodes can only be installed on self-hosted instances of n8n.

### Who this is for

The Automated Resume Job Matching Engine is an intelligent workflow designed for career platforms, HR tech startups, recruiting firms, and AI developers who want to streamline job-resume matching using real-time data from LinkedIn and job boards.

This workflow is tailored for:

  * **HR Tech Founders** \- Building next-gen recruiting products

  * **Recruiters & Talent Sourcers** \- Seeking automated candidate-job fit evaluation

  * **Job Boards & Portals** \- Enriching user experience with AI-driven job recommendations

  * **Career Coaches & Resume Writers** \- Offering personalized job fit analysis

  * **AI Developers** \- Automating large-scale matching tasks using LinkedIn and job data




### What problem is this workflow solving?

Manually matching a resume to job description is time-consuming, biased, and inefficient. Additionally, accessing live job postings and candidate profiles requires overcoming web scraping limitations.

This workflow solves:

  * Automated LinkedIn profile and job post data extraction using Bright Data MCP infrastructure

  * Semantic matching between job requirements and candidate resume using OpenAI 4o mini

  * Pagination handling for high-volume job data

  * End-to-end automation from scraping to delivery via webhook and persisting the job matched response to disk




### What this workflow does

**Bright Data MCP for Job Data Extraction**

  * Uses Bright Data MCP Clients to extract multiple job listings (supports pagination)

  * Pulls job data from LinkedIn with the pre-defined filtering criteria's




**OpenAI 4o mini LLM Matching Engine**

  * Extracts paginated job data from the Bright Data MCP extracted info via the MCP scrape_as_html tool.

  * Extracts textual job description information via the scraped job information by leveraging the Bright Data MCP scrape_as_html tool.

  * AI Job Matching node handles the job description and the candidate resume compare to generate match scores with insights




**Data Delivery**

  * Sends final match report to a Webhook Notification endpoint

  * Persistence of AI matched job response to disk




### Pre-conditions

  1. Knowledge of Model Context Protocol (MCP) is highly essential. Please read this blog post - [model-context-protocol](https://www.anthropic.com/news/model-context-protocol)
  2. You need to have the [Bright Data](https://brightdata.com/) account and do the necessary setup as mentioned in the **Setup** section below.
  3. You need to have the Google Gemini API Key. Visit [Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/)
  4. You need to install the Bright Data MCP Server [@brightdata/mcp](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@brightdata/mcp)
  5. You need to install the [n8n-nodes-mcp](https://github.com/nerding-io/n8n-nodes-mcp)



### Setup

  1. Please make sure to setup n8n locally with MCP Servers by navigating to [n8n-nodes-mcp](https://github.com/nerding-io/n8n-nodes-mcp)
  2. Please make sure to install the Bright Data MCP Server [@brightdata/mcp](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@brightdata/mcp) on your local machine.
  3. Sign up at [Bright Data](https://brightdata.com/).
  4. Navigate to Proxies & Scraping and create a new Web Unlocker zone by selecting Web Unlocker API under Scraping Solutions.
  5. Create a Web Unlocker proxy zone called mcp_unlocker on Bright Data control panel.
  6. In n8n, configure the OpenAi account credentials.
  7. In n8n, configure the credentials to connect with MCP Client (STDIO) account with the Bright Data MCP Server as shown below.  
![MCPClientAccount.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/MCP_Client_Account_d179e03a77.png)  
Make sure to copy the Bright Data API_TOKEN within the Environments textbox above as API_TOKEN=<your-token>.
  8. Update the Set input fields for candidate resume, keywords and other filtering criteria's.
  9. Update the Webhook HTTP Request node with the Webhook endpoint of your choice.
  10. Update the file name and path to persist on disk.



### How to customize this workflow to your needs

**Target Different Job Boards**

  * Set input fields with the sites like Indeed, ZipRecruiter, or Monster



**Customize Matching Criteria**

  * Adjust the prompt inside the AI Job Match node

  * Include scoring metrics like skills match %, experience relevance, or cultural fit




**Automate Scheduling**

  * Use a Cron Node to periodically check for new jobs matching a profile

  * Set triggers based on webhook or input form submissions




**Output Customization**

  * Add Markdown/PDF formatting for report summaries

  * Extend with Google Sheets export for internal analytics




**Enhance Data Security**

  * Mask personal info before sending to external endpoints
readme_zh:
![自动化简历职位匹配引擎.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Automated_Resume_Job_Matching_Engine_ac892db331.png)

### 注意事项

社区节点仅能安装在自行托管的n8n实例上。

### 适用对象

自动化简历职位匹配引擎是一款智能工作流，专为以下场景设计：
- 职业平台
- HR科技初创公司
- 招聘机构
- 希望利用LinkedIn和招聘网站实时数据实现高效人岗匹配的AI开发者

该工作流特别适合：
* **HR科技创业者** - 打造新一代招聘产品
* **招聘专员与人才搜寻者** - 需要自动化候选人-职位匹配评估
* **招聘网站与门户** - 通过AI驱动的职位推荐提升用户体验
* **职业顾问与简历写手** - 提供个性化职位匹配分析
* **AI开发者** - 利用LinkedIn和职位数据实现大规模自动化匹配任务

### 解决的核心问题

人工匹配简历与职位描述耗时、存在偏见且效率低下。同时，获取实时职位发布和候选人资料需要克服网络爬取限制。

本工作流解决：
* 通过Bright Data MCP基础设施自动获取LinkedIn个人资料和职位发布数据
* 使用OpenAI 4o mini实现职位要求与简历的语义匹配
* 处理大批量职位数据的分页问题
* 从数据爬取到结果交付的端到端自动化（通过Webhook传递结果并持久化存储匹配报告）

### 工作流功能

**Bright Data MCP数据提取**
* 使用Bright Data MCP客户端提取多页职位列表（支持分页）
* 根据预设筛选条件从LinkedIn获取职位数据

**OpenAI 4o mini匹配引擎**
* 通过MCP scrape_as_html工具从Bright Data提取分页职位数据
* 利用爬取的HTML信息提取文本化职位描述
* AI匹配节点对比职位描述与候选人简历，生成带洞察的匹配分数

**数据交付**
* 将最终匹配报告发送至Webhook通知终端
* 将AI匹配结果持久化存储至磁盘

### 前置条件

1. 必须了解模型上下文协议(MCP)，请阅读[模型上下文协议](https://www.anthropic.com/news/model-context-protocol)
2. 需注册[Bright Data](https://brightdata.com/)账户并按下方**设置**章节完成配置
3. 需准备Google Gemini API密钥，访问[Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/)
4. 需安装Bright Data MCP服务器[@brightdata/mcp](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@brightdata/mcp)
5. 需安装[n8n-nodes-mcp](https://github.com/nerding-io/n8n-nodes-mcp)

### 设置步骤

1. 参照[n8n-nodes-mcp](https://github.com/nerding-io/n8n-nodes-mcp)在本地搭建带MCP服务器的n8n环境
2. 在本地机器安装Bright Data MCP服务器[@brightdata/mcp](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@brightdata/mcp)
3. 注册[Bright Data](https://brightdata.com/)账户
4. 进入"代理与爬取"板块，在爬取解决方案下选择Web Unlocker API创建新区域
5. 在Bright Data控制面板创建名为mcp_unlocker的Web Unlocker代理区域
6. 在n8n中配置OpenAI账户凭证
7. 如下图所示配置MCP客户端(STDIO)账户凭证以连接Bright Data MCP服务器  
![MCP客户端账户.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/MCP_Client_Account_d179e03a77.png)  
注意在环境变量文本框内填写API_TOKEN=<您的令牌>
8. 设置候选人简历、关键词等筛选条件的输入字段
9. 在Webhook HTTP请求节点配置您选择的Webhook终端
10. 设置存储匹配结果的文件名和路径

### 自定义指南

**切换目标招聘网站**
* 在输入字段设置Indeed、ZipRecruiter或Monster等站点

**调整匹配标准**
* 修改AI职位匹配节点内的提示词
* 增加技能匹配度、经验相关性或文化契合度等评分维度

**自动化调度**
* 使用Cron节点定期检查匹配个人资料的新职位
* 设置基于Webhook或表单提交的触发机制

**输出定制**
* 为报告摘要添加Markdown/PDF格式化
* 扩展Google Sheets导出功能用于内部分析

**增强数据安全**
* 在发送至外部终端前屏蔽个人信息
title_zh: 自动化简历职位匹配引擎（集成Bright Data MCP与OpenAI 4o mini）
